title: Katie the Crook
description: Recently widowed Police Chief Carl Kanisky returns home to find his household in a mess. His housekeeper, Nell, has vacuumed his goldfish, Gertrude, his youngest daughter, Samantha, has a black eye, his middle daughter, Julie, is kissing a boy in the kitchen, and his oldest daughter, Katie, has been picked up for shoplifting.

title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
description: Nell is tired of striking out on the dating scene, so the Chief sets her up with one of his officers.

title: The Second Time Around
description: The Chief is reunited with a woman he knew when they were both high school students - when she runs into his police car.

title: Mom's Birthday
description: Nell, the Chief, and the girls try to take their minds off of the fact that it today would have been the girls' mother's birthday.

title: Do or Diet
description: Nell and the Chief, who have both struggled with weight problems for years, try not to think about food.

title: A Man in Nell's Room
description: Nell quits her job and moves out of the house when she argues with the Chief over inviting her boyfriend to stay the night.

title: Your Prisoner is Dead
description: The Chief is caught in a stand-off at a drug store and is forced to shoot the hold-up man.

title: Julie's Rejection
description: Katie sponsors Julie for membership in the Silver Slippers, an exclusive club to which she belongs.

title: Julie's First Love
description: Julie falls in love with Arnie, a boy she meets at a video arcade.

title: Nell's Ex
description: Nell's ex-husband Tony, a singer who had a modest Top 40 hit in the mid-1960s, returns to audition for a gig on a TV show.

title: Katie the Cheat
description: The Chief hopes Katie will be the first member of the Kanisky family to go to college, but she doesn't believe she can do well on a test. She asks Julie to take the test for her.

title: The Emergency
description: Katie is hospitalized with what turns out to be complications from an Intra-Uterine Device.

title: Nell Goes Home
description: Nell goes back to Alabama when she learns her father is dying.

title: Samantha Steals a Squad Car
description: Samantha runs into the house after getting into a fight. Failing to get the attention of Nell and the Chief, who are fighting because Nell sat on his hat, she runs off with a squad car.

title: Grandma Fools Around
description: On their 55th wedding anniversary, Grandpa Kanisky discovers a shocking revelation about Grandma when he goes through their old love letters.

title: Hot Muffins
description: Katie's band has an opportunity for a gig in Hollywood.

title: Sam's Affair
description: Samantha believes that an innocent kiss from a boy has made her pregnant, but no one will clear up the situation for her.

title: The Robbery
description: Two burglars break into the house while the Chief and the girls are away at an award ceremony and Nell is out with a friend.

title: An Unmarried Couple
description: Katie's friend Valerie is pregnant, and her boyfriend Jonathan is unsure about marrying her.

title: Nell Goes to Jail
description: When the Kaniskys' phone service is mistakenly cut off for non-payment (it was supposed to be a Chinese woman), Nell clashes with the service representative at the phone company.

title: Brother Ed and the Hooker
description: The Chief doesn't approve when his brother Ed has a date with a woman who used to be a prostitute.

title: Sam's Imaginary Friend
description: Sam causes a stir in the household because of her imaginary friend named Debbie Jo.

title: Grandpa's Visit
description: Grandpa Kanisky causes commotion when he stays over at the house.

title: Take My Baby, Please
description: Valerie, the girl who married and gave birth at the same time in the Kanisky household, returns with the news that her husband has walked out on her. Nell helps her find a job so that she can support her baby.

title: Porko's II
description: Dr. George Avery, founder of the diet group People Organized to Reduce and Kick Obesity (PORKO), gives a speech at one of Nell's meetings. Having gained back a significant amount of weight, he is depressed and wants to end his life. It's up to Nell and the other PORKO members to try and stop him.

title: The Chief's Gay Evening
description: During a stakeout, a police officer admits his homosexuality to the Chief, who is extremely displeased.

title: Katie Steals Julie's Jock
description: Katie and Julie clash over a boy they both like.

title: Sam Faces Death
description: While Nell is away at a funeral, Officer Simpson accidentally shoots the Chief in the hand. The injuries are minor, but nonetheless Samantha worries that he's going to die.

title: Nell Goes Door to Door
description: Nell gets a job selling Amaze-O-Vac vacuum cleaners door to door, finding out too late about the shoddy quality of the product.

title: Love Thy Neighbor
description: Nell goes to court when a neighbor's dog becomes a nuisance.

title: Love, Kidney
description: When Uncle Ed falls ill suddenly, he learns that he needs a kidney transplant from a relative, so he asks the Chief to donate his kidney.

title: Julie Smokes
description: The Chief is angry when he catches Julie smoking a cigarette.

title: The Centerfold: Part 1
description: The Chief fires a female officer for posing for a pornographic magazine.

title: The Centerfold: Part 2
description: The Mayor of Glenlawn puts political pressure on the Chief over the female officer who posed nude.

title: The Custody Suit
description: The Chief's sister-in-law, Blanche Ross, drops in unexpectedly on his birthday and treats Nell condescendingly. Later night, she walks into the kitchen and sees Nell performing the Heimlich maneuver on the Chief, and assumes they're having sex. She decides to sue the Chief for custody of the girls.

title: The Return of the Doo-Wop Girls
description: Nell learns that the members of a singing group she used to belong to are in town, and she reflects on how they tricked her into leaving the group for a thinner replacement.

title: Eddie Gets Married
description: Uncle Ed asks his girlfriend Maxine to marry him.

title: Grandpa Robs a Bank
description: At the bank, Grandpa is confused for a bank robber.

title: Glenlawn Street Blues
description: Nell takes Samantha to the police station to show her that their real day-to-day functions bear no resemblance to what she sees on her favorite TV cop shows.

title: Nell and the Kid
description: A delicatessen owner takes in a young girl who tried to shoplift from him.

title: Nell Gets Sick
description: Grandma Kanisky takes over the household while Nell is sick.

title: The Groupie
description: Julie wants to meet her favorite singer, Andy Gibb, who is doing a recording session in town.

title: The Way to a Man's Heart
description: Nell is attracted to a man in her diet group.

title: Katie's Commitment
description: Nell and the Chief worry when they see Katie going out with a 34-year-old college professor.

title: Joey: Part 1
description: Officer Simpson catches Joey Donovan, an abandoned seven-year-old boy, trying to bilk people out of their money.

title: Joey: Part 2
description: When the social worker comes to pick up Joey, Nell tells her he ran away.

title: The Mayor
description: The new mayor of Glenlawn takes an interest in Nell.

title: Melissa
description: Nell sets the Chief up with a woman who, unknown to her, is a male-to-female transsexual.

title: Nell's Friend
description: Nell's friend (and sometimes rival) Addy Wilson, a Phi Beta Kappa, comes to town.

title: Grandpa's Rebellion
description: Nell and the Kaniskys try to persuade the recently widowed Grandpa to come and live with them.

title: A Kanisky Christmas
description: Nell's plans to give Joey a Christmas with the family meet with resistance, they've all made plans.

title: Herbie
description: Samantha believes the world is coming to an end.

title: James Returns
description: Upset because her ex has remarried, Nell goes out with the girls and runs into the other lover of her life.

title: Samantha's Protest
description: The Chief puts his whole family (and Nell) in the lock-up after they join Samantha in protesting the planned destruction of an old Spanish mission.

title: Flashback
description: Nell recalls how she met the girls' mother, Margaret Kanisky, and how she gave up a singing career to take care of them when Margaret revealed that was terminally ill.

title: Knock Three Times
description: Nell undergoes hypnosis to recall the location of a missing ring, but the side effects are unexpected.

title: Valentine
description: Nell arranges some Valentine's Day dates for the family; all of them end in disaster.

title: The Big Apple: Part 1
description: Nell and Addy win a trip to New York City on "Wheel of Fortune."

title: The Big Apple: Part 2
description: Nell and Addy fear that the man who stole their suitcase has come back for them.

title: Rodeo
description: After getting caught in the rain with Joey at the rodeo, Grandpa is hospitalized with severe pneumonia.

title: Katie's College
description: Nell is upset when she learns that Katie would rather open a business than go to college.

title: The Center
description: Grandpa attends a dance at a senior citizen's center.

title: Class of '84
description: The final tests stand in the way of Nell and Katie each receiving their high school diplomas.

title: New Orleans: Part 1
description: Nell and Joey go to New Orleans for a little holiday. While there Nell runs into an ex who proposes to her. And Joey runs into someone he thinks he knows.

title: Nell's Birthday
description: There's nothing happy for Nell about her birthday, until she learns it isn't the birthday she thinks it is.

title: Grandpa's Secret Life
description: A woman from Grandpa's past returns.

title: Sam's First Love
description: Samantha falls in love with an 18 year old con artist.

title: Who Dunnit?
description: When Nell's CPR patient dies, Ray Parker Jr. performs at the benefit for his widow, neither of them knowing that the deceased was a vicious mobster known as Eddie the Enforcer.

title: Breakdance
description: Katie's having some financial trouble with her shop and tries to keep Nell from finding out about because they know she'll over react. And when Joey seems to be spending more of his time on learning how to break dance instead of his studies, Nell tells him he has to stop. But he tells her he's doing it so that he can perform at his teacher's retirement party. But when the teacher tells Nell she isn't retiring anytime soon. Nell tries to find out what he is hiding.

title: Daddy's Little Girl
description: Nell thinks she has quite a find in a charming archaeologist, until she discovers he's Addy's daddy.

title: Carl's Delicate Moment
description: A female officer accuses the Chief of sexual harassment.

title: Julie's Lie
description: Julie lies to Nell to be with her boyfriend Jonathan.

title: Baby of the Family
description: To get back at Nell for not letting her go on a fishing trip, Sam plans to use Joey to get back at her.

title: TV or Not TV
description: Nell tries to get her family and friends to go one evening without watching any television.

title: The Spirit of Christmas
description: During the Christmas season, Nell and Addy are attracted to the same man.

title: Grandpa's Will
description: Grandpa is acting very cranky. He's complaining about having to share a room with Joey. He wants to move out but Carl reminds him he has no resources.

title: The Answering Machine
description: Nell is dating a lawyer. Grandpa doesn't trust him because he is a lawyer. When Nell goes to see him before he goes on a business trip and overhears a couple of messages left on his answering machine by women. Nell is insecure and when one of those women goes with him on his trip, she freaks out and leaves a message on his machine telling him she's dumping him. But when she learns that she's wrong, she doesn't know what to do. Julie tells Nell she should talk to him and apologize, which she nixes. That's when Katie suggests she erase the message problem is how does she get into his apartment.

title: The Gift
description: Nell's stressed because she's being honored as the woman of the year and can't find anything to wear. Julie shows her the diamond necklace her new boyfriend just gave her. Nell tells her that she should give it back because she doesn't know him that well. She entrusts it to Nell till she meets him again. Nell's new boyfriend gives her a mink coat, which she takes and plans to wear at the ceremony and also wears the necklace. Later she gets robbed. And tries to tell Julie what happened without looking like a hypocrite.

title: Alabamy Bound: Part 1
description: Nell goes back to Alabama for her sister's wedding, where she clashes with her mother.

title: Alabamy Bound: Part 2
description: Nell's mother plans to move to Glenlawn with her.

title: Earthquake
description: After an earthquake, Nell is trapped in the library with a deaf woman who can read lips, but only in Spanish.

title: The Lookalike
description: Addy's women's group is having a benefit concert with Sammy Davis, Jr. as the emcee. When Sammy can't make it, Nell finds a man who looks like him and tries to get him to perform.

title: Cat Story
description: During a torrential rainstorm, Officer Simpson disappears while trying to save a cat and is presumed to have died.

title: Police Mamas
description: Nell and Addy take over when the entire Glenlawn police force suffers food poisoning.

title: Monkey See, Monkey Do
description: Everyone gets mad at the Chief and starts to move out of the house one by one.

title: Friendship
description: Nell is angry at Addy, so she decides to find a new best friend.

title: Julie's Birthday
description: It's Julie's birthday, and she's depressed about breaking up with her boyfriend, Jonathan.

title: Joey's Train
description: It has been three months since Chief Kanisky died, when a present he bought for Joey's birthday turns up. Meanwhile, Julie and Jonathan want to move into his bedroom, but Nell objects to this.

title: Ship of Fools: Part 1
description: There's a major house payment that's due so everyone tries to pull all the cash they have. But it still comes up short. Later Nell's ex-husband, who says his band plays on cruise ships, asks Nell to fill in for the band's singer. Nell initially refuses but upon learning about the payment and that what she'll be payed will enough for the payment reluctantly goes and brings Addy and Joey with her.

title: Ship of Fools: Part 2
description: Upon learning that her ex-husband is remarried to a younger woman, Nell's voice goes out, jeopardizing her earning the money needed for the house payment. The ship's doctor tells her to relax but when she tries another stressful moment befalls her.

title: The Man from Zoron
description: Joey meets a man who claims to be from another planet.

title: Mama
description: Nell's mother comes to Glenlawn to have eye surgery.

title: Sam's Little Girl
description: Sam volunteers as a Big Sister to a mischievous little girl who is rude to Nell.

title: The Elevator
description: Nell and Addy find themselves stuck in separate, adjacent elevators in the same building.

title: Nell's New Car
description: Nell buys Addy's old car. When the car starts to break down, it comes between the two of them.

title: Snippets
description: Nell and the Kaniskys and their friends look back at the past during the Christmas season.

title: Second Chance: Part 1
description: Nell agrees to sing for a band led by an ex-convict.

title: Second Chance: Part 2
description: Nell and the band appear on "Hour Magazine".

title: The Gun
description: Joey is frightened when Nell is accidentally shot in the foot with the Chief's old gun.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Nell goes to apply for a job. But the man she meets tells her that she's not what he's looking for. She assumes he's a bigot so she gets a lawyer who specializes in racial discrimination to confront him. But they find a lot of blacks working there. They find out that why he doesn't want to hire Nell.

title: Katie's Korner
description: Nell worries what Katie might do after a string of extremely bad luck.

title: Found Money
description: Nell shares her monetary inheritance with her family and friends.

title: The Purse Snatcher
description: Nell's purse is stolen at a Greek restaurant.

title: Joey Meets Matthew
description: Joey's father returns and introduces him to his younger brother, Matthew.

title: Nell Goes Back to New York
I Love New York
description: Nell starts to regret moving to New York. Even after Grandpa successfully sells the Kaniskys' house, she still feels homesick for Glenlawn.

title: Joey's Hero
description: Captain Jerk, the star of Joey's favorite TV show, chokes on his whistle and is hospitalized. He needs a transfusion, and Nell gladly agrees to allow the hospital to use her blood. However, she is livid when she learns that the Captain is the leader of a white supremacist group.

title: Save the Church
description: When Nell learns that the church where her father preached is being torn down, she goes back to Alabama to try and save it.

title: Someday My Prince...
description: Nell goes out on a date with an African prince.

title: Mama's Date
description: Nell tries to interfere in her mother's love life.
